title: Looking for Bronze team
body:
Howdy!
im a B3, im looking for a team, to work towards at least gold with, and have a good time, i'd even like to work out weekly ranked 5's with the team

ign: Shakey IV
Main roles: Bot lane, Jungle
main adcs: ezreal, lucian, jinx, sivir and draaaven??? (in order)
Main Supports: Sona, Thresh, morgana, leona, lulu  (In Order)
Main Jungles: Jarvan IV, Reksai,  Lee Sin, Fiddlesticks (In Order) (ish)
I'm friendly, i love to have a good time.
i dont flame people for playing badly, however if your a dick to me, ill be a dick to you XD

replies.body: What is the point of making a bronze ranked team, you dont even get anything for it.
Just because you get a bronze team doesn't mean you get nothing out of it you can always climb.

> [{quoted}](name=Queen Of Hearts,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=hbjeZq02,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2014-12-20T03:34:38.239+0000)
>
> Just because you get a bronze team doesn't mean you get nothing out of it you can always climb.

Thats's exactly right, which is the aim,
obviously, but i'd like to also make it a little more serious than that! like i mentioned maybe weekly sessions
Looking for team , main support KDA 2.7 for season, 4.4 for the last 20 games since only playing support.
Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.
